nodes.text: The Batuuan Harvest Festival was a holiday celebrated at Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu. It was held in the autumn to celebrate the harvest season, especially Golden Lichen. During the celebration, Oga Garra allowed the lichen to be used in special dishes and drinks. The locals decorated the outpost with golden colored banners and often accentuated their clothing similarly.

The Batuuan Harvest Festival was created for Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, which opened to guests at Disneyland Park on May 31, 2019. It was first identified by that name in the reference book Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge: Traveler's Guide to Batuu, which is presented as an in-universe document of the same name.
